entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
